name: Greek-Style Green Beans
keywords: green beans, tomato, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 pounds green beans, washed and trimmed
2 plum tomatoes, cored and minced, optional
Several tablespoons extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and salt it. Boil beans until just barely tender. Drain and rinse with cold water until cool, then transfer to bowl.
When ready to eat, toss beans with tomatoes, if using, olive oil, salt, pepper and lemon juice to taste.
